backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing per-user profiles and link CRUD with access control checks.
feature_evidence.json: Defines feature evidence for dark theme enforcement and removal of scroll-based visual effects.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining dark theme color tokens and base styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML shell mounting the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling authentication, dark mode enforcement, and rendering the link library UI.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthControl: Authentication button component handling sign-in/out with Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog prompting new users to enter a name and save their profile.
frontend/src/components/common/ConfirmDi: Reusable confirmation dialog for destructive link actions with loading state.
frontend/src/components/layout/GameMenuL: Layout wrapper with background image and solid overlay ensuring consistent dark appearance.
frontend/src/components/link-library/Edi: Dialog component for editing an existing link, handling validation and updating via useUpdateLink.
frontend/src/components/link-library/Lin: Form for adding new links with validation and submission through useAddLink.
Loads all links and renders the link form and list, handling loading and error states.
Displays a scrollable list of saved links with actions to open, edit, or delete each one.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, identity loading, and related status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useLinks.ts: React Query hooks for fetching, adding, updating, and deleting links through the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Hooks for retrieving and saving the authenticated user’s profile via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and permanent dark theme CSS variables with enforced black background, white foreground, and smooth focus/transition styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/validateUrl.ts: Validates URLs for required protocol and domain format, returning specific error messages.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme tokens, colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Describes project state, requirements, issues, and architectural notes for a desktop link‑library app with a fixed dark theme.
